content.text: Pretty good! I'm a pretty peaceful person but I can hold my own if I need to. What about you?
I'm good! I'm a peaceful person too, but I'm really shy and introverted.
I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment. Do you like animals?
Yes, I love animals! I have a dog and two cats at home.
Aww, that's so cute! I love cats but I'm allergic to them.
Oh no, that's too bad! Do you like any other animals?
I love all animals! I think they're all so cute and cuddly.
Me too! I think they're all amazing creatures.
I like to read, write, and do arts and crafts. What about you?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Cool! I've never been much of a gamer but I've heard they can be really fun.
Yeah, they can be really fun! I've been playing video games since I was a little kid.
Oh, that's cool! What's your favorite video game?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite, but I really like the Legend of Zelda series
